name: Flappy Jetpack (FraserGameDev)
description:
(Note that the iOS one might not work, I have never built for iOS)

Flappy Jetpack is an awesome flappy bird-like experience, when you play it is absolutely immersive, that you won't want to stop playing it!

 Of course this is a whacky but also good clone of flappy bird since you can change the sprite to a even better jetpack, instead of a bullet you will see.... a real jetpack???

This Game Has Very Exiting Secrets (like the death screen) that i hope you will enjoy

Note that the music is pretty loud so probably turn it down

Assets: 

https://www.dafont.com/04b-19.font

https://www.spriters-resource.com/mobile/flappybird/sheet/59894/
